entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 3:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
